title.narrative: Establishment of the UNIDO-BRICS Technology Exchange E-Platform

description.narrative:
The project objective is to support the BRICS countries in their efforts to achieve technology-led development through technology transfer, as well as to stimulate partnerships thereby contributing towards the Inclusive and Sustainable Industrial Development. Implicitly, the project represents an important stepping-stone toward forging a long-term partnership between UNIDO and BRICS countries, as well as amongst the BRICS themselves in various areas related to technology exchange with the ultimate goal of expanding the e-platform to other countries.
The project outcome is the establishment of the sustainable UNIDO-BRICS Technology Exchange E-Platform, aimed at creating a database of technologies to share the best technological solutions, business models and to improve the industrial production efficiency as well as to reduce environmental footprint.
The project outcome will be achieved through establishment of the online based Technology Exchange E-Platform (Output 1) and a number of the awareness raising events in the BRICS countries and at BRICS meetings/ forums/ summits (Output 2), as well as the implementation of the Sustainability activities (Output 3). The project is divided into two phases:
1.Establishment phase (30 months), which will result into fully functional online Platform with accompanied with clear procedures for requesting and providing technologies. UNIDO will also disseminate the best practices and lessons learned globally (Indicators: # registered companies on the Platform; #completed and ongoing technology exchanges; #registered technologies; #companies acknowledged with the Platform);
2.Roll-out phase (30 months), which aims at achieving full financial and operational sustainability of the Platform. During this phase, UNIDO will continue provide technical support, access to global fora and required expertise, when necessary, however, the Platform will rely more on the internal capacitated expertise and will target to generate own revenue to sustain the project goals in long-term (Indicators: generated income; #completed and ongoing technology exchanges).
